pony.events.Listener

authors
AxGord
see
pony.events.Signal
type
class


Constructor

new(?he : Event -> Void, ?hd : Dynamic, ?count : Int, ?priority : Int, ?delay : Int)
Create new event listener.
parameters
?he Function listener with event argument.
?hd Function listener without event argument.
count Count runs.
priority Listener priority
delay Speed limit.
see
pony.events.Event

Instance Variables

count : Int

Count runs.

delay(getDelay,setDelay) : Int

Speed limit.
see
pony.SpeedLimit

handler(getHandler,null) : Dynamic

Handler Function, only get.

priority(getPriority,setPriority) : Int

Listener priority, if set then update all signals priority.
see
pony.Priority

Instance Methods

abort() : Void

Not run next function after delay.

addSignal(s : Signal) : Void

Add signal for event. Invert style.

dispatch(event : Event) : Void

Call handler, not use this functions. Use Signal dispath.

remove() : Void

Remove this listener from all signals.
